summary: Quantumoney.app simulated/pro patch: fix useLanguage provider error by wrapping app in LanguageProvider while preserving existing premium black/gold responsive UI (100dvh), HUD + AR map info window, aesthetic-only visual sync with QuantumoneyAR.app, sitewide footer (no 'Caffeine'), cookie notice, clickable Terms of Service & Privacy Policy pages with full Feb/2026 text, and simulated-only features (public chat UI, presale & golden paper static UI) with no backend/transactions.
architectural_notes: All functionality is simulated/UI-only: no backend integration, no real transactions, and no external app connections (visual sync only).
Internationalization must be provided app-wide via a top-level LanguageProvider wrapper around App/Root.
known_issues: Current runtime error: useLanguage must be used within a LanguageProvider.

existing_features.title: Fix the runtime error "useLanguage must be used within a LanguageProvider" by ensuring the entire routed application tree is wrapped in LanguageProvider (without editing any immutable entry files).

Enforce simulated/public chat behavior as UI-only with no backend calls and no persistence: messages must not be stored in localStorage/IndexedDB; they should exist only for the current browser session/tab in memory.

Ensure the global layout matches the agreed simulated/pro build requirements: responsive full-height layout using 100dvh semantics, premium black/gold styling, and consistent HUD/map-info-window visual language aligned to QuantumoneyAR.app (visual sync only; no external connections).

Update/verify the footer to be visible and usable on all common resolutions and remove any remaining "Caffeine" references across the entire site (UI text, footer, metadata, comments, and any other surfaced strings), while preserving all existing content already present.

Ensure Terms of Service and Privacy Policy pages are fully populated with the complete Feb/2026 text content (no placeholders/truncation) and remain fully navigable via site links; keep the cookie consent banner visible on entry with working links to the Privacy Policy.

Keep presale and gold paper features strictly simulated/static UI: do not add real purchase logic, transactions, or backend-changing behavior; preserve all existing presale/gold-paper content and visuals already implemented.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix useLanguage error by wrapping the entire app with <LanguageProvider> so all components using useLanguage() are within provider
Ensure visual-only synchronization with QuantumoneyAR.app (matching layout/colors/HUD/windows/footer) with no external connections
Implement public chat as fully simulated/static browser UI (no backend, no message storage, no real sending)
Add fully clickable Terms of Service and Privacy Policy pages and insert complete text content (Feb/2026 version)
Add/ensure sitewide footer fixed/visible at all resolutions with required text (by HTgamers, helpdesk@quantumoney.net, “On-chain na Internet Computer (ICP)”) and remove all references to “Caffeine”
Add visible clickable cookie message/banner on entry
Keep pre-sale and golden paper sections as static/simulated UI only (no purchase logic/transactions)
Maintain existing responsive global layout (100dvh), premium black/gold aesthetic, HUD and AR map info window, and optimize performance without backend changes
